sub_fields.message: This layout will display all published FAQ posts in menu order.

sub_fields.label: Select Posts?
sub_fields.name: select_posts
sub_fields.message: Toggle this to choose the posts you want to display. Leave it off to pull most recent posts.

sub_fields.label: Content Alignment (Horizontal)
sub_fields.name: hero_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether you want content aligned to the Left or Centered.

sub_fields.label: Content Alignment (Vertical)
sub_fields.name: hero_alignment_vertical
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether you want content aligned to the Top, Middle, or Bottom

sub_fields.label: Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: hero_bg_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: When enabled, background image has a dark overlay and text is set to white to improve legibility.

sub_fields.label: Locations Layout
sub_fields.name: locations_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Select a card or detailed list style layout for this widget.
